ygData.subject: Peashooting (was: Re: A rant)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... One time on a Nag run, I was the last one standing in my group with half a bubble of health left.  I figured it was pointless to stand there and simply
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 8 Feb 2000, Ryan Honeyman wrote:

> I'd take you along for the ride. I wouldn't mind watching you die
> a few times ;-) You can bellow at Vox if it makes you feel good. 8)

One time on a Nag run, I was the last one standing in my group with half a
bubble of health left. I figured it was pointless to stand there and
simply die, so I started running back to the staircase. On the way, I
sent a parting dirge.

Lord Nagafen says 'Hit by non-melee for 25 points of damage.'
You have been summoned!
etc.

For doing nothing but weaving two songs, 25 damage gets me a summon?
Remind me never to swing a fist at him..

Athren
